verses.roman:
rāyera vidāya-bhāva nā yāya sahana
kahite nā pāri ei tāhāra varṇana

synonyms: rāyera vidāya-bhāva—feelings of separation from Rāmānanda Rāya; nā yāya—not possible; sahana—to tolerate; kahite—to speak; nā pāri—I am not able; ei—this; tāhāra—of that; varṇana—a description.
translation: Rāmānanda Rāya's separation from Caitanya Mahāprabhu is very difficult to describe. It is almost intolerable, and therefore I cannot describe it further.
